about.text: I'm a front end developer with over twenty years of experience in software delivery.  Most recently I have cross trained into Javascript Front End Development using mainly ReactJS but have experience in other frameworks such as Vue and AngularJS along with a grounding in vanilla javascript I also possess good styling skills in HTML5/CSS3.  Now focusing toward a TDD approach to supply quality software products to the end customer.

skillsummary: These are my core skills other technologies I have been exposed to commercially are Java, MongoDB, Docker and Jenkins.

musicaside.title: JJ Cale - Fate of a fool
Jorge Ben - Take it Easy My Brother Charlie
Nina Simone - Ain't Got No - Got Life

latestproject.title: Developer Connector
latestproject.description1: An application I wrote that allows developers to connect with one another.
latestproject.description2: I used ReactJS, Express, Mongo and Node for the API layer (MERN) then Bootstrap for the styling.

projects.title: Omnifood Static Web Page
projects.synopsis: Web page demonstrating HTML and CSS
projects.description1: Omnifood mock company website showcasing styling with HTML5, CSS3 (including animations) and JQuery.

projects.title: Mean Hotel Application
projects.description1: Hotel Application I put together using Mongo, Express, Angular and Node.
projects.description2: Written in ReactJS, Express, Mongo Database (mLab), NodeJS (API layer)

projects.title: Bolton Kendo Club Website
projects.description1: A live system written using Vue JS, Express, Node API layer and Mongo (Cloud hosted)

projects.title: Expensify Application
projects.description1: Expensify application I wrote in ReactJS using Firebase as the datastore.
projects.description2: Written in ReactJS, Express, Mongo Database (mLab), NodeJS (API layer). SASS Styling

projects.title: Liverpool Kendo Club
projects.description1: Example live application I wrote for LKC using React JS and Firebase.
projects.description2: Written in ReactJS and Redux with a Firebase Datastore. SASS Styling

otherprojects.title: Kanban Board
otherprojects.description: Drag and Drop kanban board framework with tests.

otherprojects.title: Accommodation UI
otherprojects.description: Basic Booking.com mock up rendering JSON using Redux. Full test suite using Jest

experience.title: Lead Developer
experience.description: Lead Uniface developer responsible for regular updates and maintenance to the nationwide parcel delivery system. All project work carried out with a waterfall approach.

experience.title: Web Developer
experience.description: Web developer responsible for the delivery of Agile projects in Ruby on Rails and React JS.  Experience gained in JQuery and vanilla Javascript.  First experienced TDD, Continuous Delivery and the use of build Pipelines (Jenkins).  All project work was carried out in Agile teams usint a fully colloborative approach in order to deliver software.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
experience.description: Full stack developer responsible for projects around the broadcast and content distribution system which consisted of an Angular UI, NodeJS API layer along with C# watcher modules.
